org.epri.pt2.reassembler
Class TcpReassembler

java.lang.Object
  org.epri.pt2.listeners.PacketListener
      org.epri.pt2.reassembler.TcpReassembler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.jnetpcap.packet.PcapPacketHandler<java.lang.Object>
public class TcpReassembler
extends PacketListener
implements org.jnetpcap.packet.PcapPacketHandler<java.lang.Object>

Reassembles tcp packages into directional port/ip pair flows. Currently packages are segmented using time-based detection.

Author:
Tam Do

Constructor Detail

TcpReassembler

public TcpReassembler()
Creates a tcp reassembler instance. The reassembler starts a packetThread instance which periodically reconstructs http packets.
